issue.title: [C++] Determine how to represent dictionary encoding in Substrait
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15536](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15536). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Substrait does not appear to include dictionary encoded types in the spec at the moment.  We need to figure out how we want to represent this in substrait (e.g. custom type variations?  new custom types?), potentially create YAML files, and potentially create Substrait issues / discussion to ensure we are aligned on our approach.
